sentences.sContent: When we first meet Sylvester Stallone in that film, he frankly looks like a skinned heifer that someone left out in the rain for six weeks.
sentences.sContent_eng: When we first meet Sylvester Stallone in that film, he frankly looks like a skinned heifer that someone left out in the rain for six weeks.
sentences.sCn: 影片开头，我们看看西尔维斯特·史泰龙，简直就象一头被扒了皮的小母牛，而且，还被人扔在雨里，放了六星期。

trans.tranOther: a young cow that has not yet given birth to a  calf
